title: How to Firefox
author: Vinnl
aiHeadline: How to Firefox: A comprehensive guide on how to use Firefox, because apparently some people still don't know how to use a browser.

title: The United States withdraws from UNESCO
author: layer8
aiHeadline: The United States withdraws from UNESCO: Because apparently, the US has decided that cultural exchange and scientific cooperation are overrated.

title: Complete silence is always hallucinated as "ترجمة نانسي قنقر" in Arabic
author: edent
aiHeadline: Complete silence is always hallucinated as 'ترجمة نانسي قنقر' in Arabic: Because AI apparently thinks silence is the same as Nancy Qanjar's translation, which is about as logical as a cat thinking a laser pointer is a mouse.

title: Ozzy Osbourne has died
author: fantunes
aiHeadline: Ozzy Osbourne has died: The Prince of Darkness has finally turned out the lights for the final time, leaving behind a legacy of heavy metal, bad decisions, and questionable fashion choices.

title: Unsafe and Unpredictable: My Volvo EX90 Experience
author: prova_modena
aiHeadline: Unsafe and Unpredictable: My Volvo EX90 Experience: Because apparently, Volvo has decided that 'safety' now means 'unsafe and unpredictable,' which is about as comforting as a clown promising to keep your secrets.
